[#soil-mottle-abundance_result-value]
====== Result value

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:soil-soil-pit-characterization-protocol-shapes:soil-mottle-abundance:result-value`
|Label | Result value
|Definition | The value of `rdf:value` _MUST_ exist in the Soils mottle abundances codes controlled vocabulary.
|Comment | The value in `sosa:hasResult` _MUST_ be a value in `sh:in`, which is the Soils mottle abundances codes controlled vocabulary.
include::../../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Property | Value
|Controlled list items | The result value MUST be from the following list: 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/c6cb7c59-aa12-5eb9-8c08-11bb10cbdf47[`Common (10-20%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/d62fdfd2-0287-5a4b-8010-f272ef8d5ad7[`Few (2-10%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/68c50cb9-98c5-597c-9446-00976801eb5e[`Many (20-50%)`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/a86d4652-cdf5-5063-99df-c418e833302d[`No mottles or other colour patterns`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/0033bb3d-fd5a-51eb-ba4b-8c249430aa6d[`Not Collected`] 

link:https://linked.data.gov.au/def/nrm/24cd1b0f-22ad-51f1-8890-59fa1e3fe298[`Very few (<2%)`]
